snippet: Teresita Galarza, who has two children diagnosed with schizophrenia, including a daughter who has a son of her own, is the sole breadwinner and caregiver to the family.
lead_paragraph: Teresita Galarza, who has two children diagnosed with schizophrenia, including a daughter who has a son of her own, is the sole breadwinner and caregiver to the family.
abstract: Brooklyn Community Services, one of the agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, is providing support and counseling for Teresita Galarza, who has two children diagnosed with schizophrenia.

headline.main: A Mother Leads a Family Tested by Schizophrenia
headline.print_headline: A Mother Leads a Family Tested by Schizophrenia

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
